elements.title: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 Standard Edition
elements.description: EA SPORTS FC™ 25 gives you more ways to win for the club. Team up with friends in your favourite modes with the new 5v5 Rush, and manage your club to victory as FC IQ delivers more tactical control than ever before.

elements.title: Grand Theft Auto V: Premium Edition
elements.description: The Grand Theft Auto V: Premium Edition includes the complete GTAV story, Grand Theft Auto Online and all existing gameplay upgrades and content. You’ll also get the Criminal Enterprise Starter Pack, the fastest way to jumpstart your criminal empire in GTA Online.

elements.title: Black Myth: Wukong
elements.description: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

seller.name: Game Science Interactive Technology Co., Ltd.

elements.title: Crosshair X
elements.description: Overlay custom crosshairs on every game you play. Choose from thousands of unique crosshairs created by the Crosshair X community or design your own using the designer.

elements.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild™
elements.description: Experience an atmospheric hunting game like no other in this realistic and visually breathtaking open world. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric single player campaign, or share the ultimate hunting experience with friends.

elements.title: Dead by Daylight
elements.description: Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

elements.title: Farming Simulator 25
elements.description: Farming Simulator 25 adds rice & other crops on three maps, new animals, productions & more. 400+ machines included, with enhanced graphics & physics.

elements.title: World War Z Aftermath
elements.description: World War Z: Aftermath is the ultimate co-op zombie shooter and the next evolution of the original hit World War Z that has now captivated over 15 million players. Fight off hordes of ravenous zombies in intense story episodes across new zombie-ravaged locations around the world.

elements.title: Steep Standard Edition
elements.description: Ride a massive open world across the Alps, where the powder is always fresh and the run never ends.

elements.title: Cyberpunk 2077
elements.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City — a dangerous megalopolis obsessed with power, glamor, and ceaseless body modification.

elements.title: Alan Wake 2
elements.description: Saga Anderson arrives to investigate ritualistic murders in a small town. Alan Wake pens a dark story to shape the reality around him. These two heroes are somehow connected. Can they become the heroes they need to be?

elements.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
elements.description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is the unforgiving FPS survival adventure in a dark science-fiction open world. Scavenge for gear and resources, hunt for wonders, make hard decisions to survive and pave the path through the Chornobyl Anomalous Zone.

elements.title: God of War Ragnarök
elements.description: From Santa Monica Studio comes the sequel to the critically acclaimed God of War (2018). Embark on an epic and heartfelt journey as Kratos and Atreus struggle with holding on and letting go – now on PC.

elements.title: Shatterline
elements.description: Get ready for the apocalypse! Shatterline is an intense FPS with roguelike co-op PVE and PVP modes. Pick a unique operator, customize your look and weapons, and combat the alien plague!

elements.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Skywalker Saga
elements.description:
Play through all nine Skywalker saga films in a game unlike any other. With over 300 playable characters, over 100 vehicles, and 23 planets to explore, a galaxy far, far away has never been more fun! 

*Includes classic Obi-Wan Kenobi playable character
